## ExtendedStylesInjectOptions.scriptType property

The script type. Options: - `ts`<!-- -->: typescript - `js`<!-- -->: javascript

Default: 'js'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scriptType?: 'ts' | 'js';
```
